instructions: From the Home screen, swipe up and then tap Settings > Edge Sense . Assign Squeeze for Face Unlock to the short squeeze or squeeze and hold gesture by following the steps in Enabling the squeeze and hold gesture . You can then do the following: To turn off the screen and lock your phone, squeeze the lower sides of the phone. To wake up and unlock your phone, hold the phone in portrait orientation at face level, squeeze it, and look at the front camera.
